history.content:
The Berkeley Political Review (BPR) is recruiting, and we want YOU! We want you to join our passionate team dedicated to advancing political discourse on the UC Berkeley campus and beyond.

We are currently recruiting for our Tech Department, which maintains and improves the BPR website and creates interactive data visualizations for our articles and for other projects. We’re looking for data scientists as well as web developers, but are open to anyone wanting to join the BPR Tech Department. NO PREVIOUS CODING OR DATA EXPERIENCE NECESSARY! We’ll give you the tools and training you’ll need to create amazing data visualizations and interactive website features. 

BPR also has openings for writers, designers, and people interested in business or marketing. If you want to be a part of our mission, attend one of our info sessions and visit our website at bpr.berkeley.edu/apply to check out the application!

Info Session 2:

Tuesday, January 28th 8:00-9:00p.m. @ Barrows 60

BPR Game/Social Night:

Thursday, January 30th 8:00-9:00p.m. @ Location TBD
history.subject: Web Development with the Berkeley Political Review
